titles.title: I Just Want To Be Where You Are

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I just want to be where You are. Dwelling daily in Your presence. I don’t want to worship from afar. Draw me near to where You are.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I just want to be where You are In Your dwelling place forever Take me to the place where You are I just want to be with You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I want to be where You are Dwelling in Your presence. Feasting at Your table Surrounded by Your glory{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In Your presence That’s where I always want to be I just want to be I just want to be with You.{/lang-eng}
